meanings.sent1: After the long hike, Sarah felt fordone and just wanted to rest.

meanings.sent5: The fordone worker collapsed into bed after a hard day's work.

meanings.sent5: The fordone toy was missing pieces and broken beyond repair.

meanings.sent1: Feeling fordone after losing the game, Tom sat quietly on the bench.
